column4: Hi, I just tried out 9.10 Desktop, and having big problems, compared to 9.04, which just worked for me.   9.10 is not finding my wifi, nor my NVidia graphics card.  So far 9.10 has been a major flop in my eyes :-(
whats the output of lspci | Wireless?
whats the output of lspci | grep Wireless?
I know I have a broadcom based PCI adapter (802.11n) and it was fine under 9.04, and non working under 9.10.  Without networking Ubuntu us useless to me,
